title: Microsoft makes sales chief Althoff CEO of commercial business
description: Bringing together sales with marketing and other functions is critical for Microsoft to lead in the artificial intelligence era, CEO Satya Nadella said.
content:
Microsoft 's top-ranking sales leader, Judson Althoff, has been promoted to a bigger role as CEO of the company's commercial business.
Satya Nadella, Microsoft's CEO, wrote in a memo on Wednesday that marketing and operations will move under Althoff'... [1382 chars]

title: Alphabet’s AI strength fuels biggest quarterly jump since 2005
description: Alphabet Inc. shares closed out their biggest quarterly gain in 20 years, the latest reflection of how investors are turning more positive on the Google parent as it strengthens its foothold in artificial intelligence.
content:
(Bloomberg/Ryan Vlastelica) — Alphabet Inc. shares closed out their biggest quarterly gain in 20 years, the latest reflection of how investors are turning more positive on the Google parent as it strengthens its foothold in artificial intelligence.

title: Apple denies harming Musk’s xAI by teaming up with OpenAI
description: Apple Inc. says it did nothing wrong in choosing to partner with OpenAI rather than Elon Musk's xAI when it added generative artificial intelligence to its iPhone operating system
content:
(Bloomberg/Robert Burnson) — Apple Inc. says it did nothing wrong in choosing to partner with OpenAI — rather than Elon Musk’s xAI — when it added generative artificial intelligence to its iPhone operating system.

title: ChatGPT is dishing out questionable advice. Parents are eating it up.
description: Research suggests more parents are increasingly relying on artificial intelligence, or AI, for a wide range of parenting queries.
content:
“Is my child hitting their developmental milestones?” “What should I do if my child has a fever?” “How do I handle toddler tantrums?”
“Am I good parent?”

content:

title: Microsoft wants to mainly use its own AI chips in the future
description: Microsoft has been developing its own chips for the data center designed to handle artificial intelligence workloads.
content:
Microsoft would like to mainly use its own chips in its data centers in the future, the tech giant's chief technology officer said on Wednesday, in a move which could reduce its reliance on major players like Nvidia and AMD .

title: Meta to use data from AI interactions to show ads on its apps

title: Elon Musk Says He Is Building Grokipedia, An AI-Powered Wikipedia Rival
description: Elon Musk announced that his artificial intelligence (AI) company xAI will be building Grokipedia, which according to the billionaire is meant to serve as an alternative to Wikipedia. Musk made a post on his social media platform 'X' writing, "We are building Grokipedia @xAI. Will be a massive improvement over Wikipedia. Frankly, it is a necessary step towards the xAI goal of understanding the Universe."
